Package com.treasure.hunt.strategy.searcher

Interface Searcher<T extends Hint>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of Hint, this searcher can handle.
All Known Subinterfaces:
HideAndSeekSearcher<T>, InsecureSearcher<T>, ObstacleSearcher<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BruteForceSearcher, NaiveAngleSearcher, NaiveCircleSearcher, StrategyFromPaper, UserControlledHintSearcher
public interface Searcher<T extends Hint>
An algorithm, trying to find a treasure in the plain, given Hint-objects by a Hider.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void init​(org.locationtech.jts.geom.Point startPosition)  
    Movement move()
    Use this to perform a initial move, without a hint given.
    Movement move​(T hint)  

  • Method Details

    • init

      void init​(org.locationtech.jts.geom.Point startPosition)
      Parameters:
      startPosition - the searchers starting position, he will initialized with.

    • move

      Movement move()
      Use this to perform a initial move, without a hint given. This is for the case, the searcher starts. (as he does normally)
      Returns:
      Movement the Movement the searcher did

    • move

      Movement move​(T hint)
      Parameters:
      hint - the hint, the Hider gave last.
      Returns:
      Movement the Movement, this searcher chose.
